instruction: Combine fresh coriander leaves, mint leaves, and green chilies in a blender.
title: Make green masala paste

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Add a little water and grind the mixture into a smooth, fine green paste.
title: Grind green masala

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Place the chicken pieces in a large mixing bowl.
title: Begin chicken marination

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Add turmeric powder, red chili powder, salt, curd, and ginger-garlic paste to the chicken.
title: Add spices and yogurt

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Add the prepared green masala paste to the bowl and mix thoroughly to coat the chicken.
title: Mix in green masala

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Cover and let the chicken marinate for at least 30 minutes to absorb the flavors.
title: Marinate the chicken

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Rinse the Seeraga Samba rice until the water runs clear, then soak it in water for 20 minutes.
title: Wash and soak rice

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Boil water in a large pot, add salt and a few drops of oil, then add the soaked rice and cook until 80% done.
title: Parboil the rice

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Once 80% cooked, drain the rice in a colander and let it rest.
title: Drain and set aside rice

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: In a heavy-bottomed pan, heat ghee and oil on medium heat.
title: Heat ghee and oil

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Add bay leaves, cloves, cardamom, cinnamon, and fennel seeds to the hot ghee-oil mix. Sauté until aromatic.
title: Add whole spices

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Add thinly sliced onions to the pan and cook until they turn golden brown.
title: Sauté onions

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they soften and blend into the onion mixture.
title: Add tomatoes

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Add the marinated chicken along with all the marinade to the pan.
title: Add marinated chicken

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Cook on medium heat, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is about 80% cooked and the masala thickens.
title: Cook chicken

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Evenly spread the partially cooked rice over the chicken in the pan.
title: Layer rice over chicken

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Sprinkle garam masala powder evenly over the layered rice.
title: Sprinkle garam masala

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Cover the pan tightly with a lid. Optionally seal edges with dough and cook on low heat for 15–20 minutes.
title: Seal and dum cook

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Turn off the heat and let the biryani rest, covered, for 10 minutes to allow flavors to settle.
title: Let biryani rest

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:00.000 --> 00:00:29.980 Welcome. Today's recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

instruction: Open the lid, gently fluff and mix the biryani without breaking the rice grains. Serve hot in donne or banana leaves if available.
title: Gently mix and serve

transcript_segments.text: 00:00:30.000 --> 00:00:59.980 Today’s recipe is Karnataka special Donne Biryani.
00:01:00.000 --> 00:01:29.980 Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

00:02:30.000 --> 00:02:59.980 Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

00:03:30.000 --> 00:03:59.980 Karnataka special Donne Biryani.

00:04:30.000 --> 00:04:59.980 Karnataka special Donne Biryani.
00:05:00.000 --> 00:05:29.980 Karnataka special Donne Biryani.
00:05:30.000 --> 00:05:59.980 Karnataka special Donne Biryani.
00:06:00.000 --> 00:06:29.980 Karnataka special Donne Biryani.
00:06:30.000 --> 00:06:59.980 Karnataka special Donne.

00:07:30.000 --> 00:07:59.980 Karnataka special Donne.
00:08:00.000 --> 00:08:29.980 Karnataka special Donne.
00:08:30.000 --> 00:08:59.980 Karnataka special Donne.
00:09:00.000 --> 00:09:29.980 Karnataka special Donne.

instruction: Covers all non-recipe content such as video greetings, channel promotions, personal stories, thanks messages, like/share/subscribe prompts, and other commentary unrelated to cooking instructions.
